vulnerability.name: USN-4905-1
vulnerability.description: Jan-Niklas Sohn discovered that the X.Org X Server incorrectly handled certain lengths of XInput extension ChangeFeedbackControl requests. An attacker could use this issue to cause the server to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: X.Org X Server could be made to crash or run programs if it received specially crafted input.
